subcourses.name: Masvomhu Ekutanga
subcourses.description: Nhanganyaya yekuverenga kwakapusa uye dzidziso yenhamba.

lessonPlan.title: Nhanganyaya kuNhamba
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezve nhamba dzose, kukosha kwenzvimbo, uye kushandisa mutsetse wenhamba.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi kukosha kwenzvimbo ye 5 mu 352?
Ko 0 inonzi nhamba yose here? (hongu kana kwete)

contentParagraphs: Nhamba dzose idzo dzisina zvikamu kana madimikira, kutanga pa 0 uye kuwedzera ne 1 nguva dzese (0, 1, 2, 3, ...).
Kukosha kwenzvimbo kunoratidza kukosha kwechiratidzo mune nhamba zvichienderana nenzvimbo yacho. Semuenzaniso, mu 352, 5 iri panzvimbo yetens, saka inomirira 50.
Mutsetse wenhamba inzira yekuona nhamba dzakarongeka. Inobatsira kunzwisisa kuverenga, kuenzanisa, uye pfungwa yekuti chii chakakura kana chidiki.

lessonPlan.title: Mabasa Akakosha
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza mabasa mana akakosha: kuverenga, kubvisa, kuwedzera, uye kupatsanura.
contentParagraphs: Kuverenga kunoreva kuunganidza nhamba kuti uwane huwandu. Kubvisa kunoreva kubvisa kubva panhamba.
Kuwedzera kuverenga kunodzokororwa. Semuenzaniso, 4 × 3 zvinoreva 4 kuwedzerwa katatu (4 + 4 + 4 = 12).
Kupatsanura kunoreva kupatsanura nhamba kuita zvikamu zvakaenzana. Semuenzaniso, 12 ÷ 3 zvinoreva kupatsanura 12 kuita mapoka matatu e4.

lessonPlan.title: Zvikamu uye Zvakawanda
lessonPlan.description: Nzwisisa maitiro ekutsvaga zvikamu, zvakawanda, uye kuziva nhamba dzakachena.

practiceQuestions.question: Ko 7 inonzi nhamba yakachena here? (hongu kana kwete)

contentParagraphs: Chikamu inhamba inopatsanura imwe nhamba pasina chasara. Semuenzaniso, 3 chikamu che 12 nekuti 12 ÷ 3 = 4.
Zvakawanda zvinobuda pakuwedzera nhamba ne integer. Semuenzaniso, zvakawanda zve 5 ndi 5, 10, 15, 20, ...
Nhamba dzakachena ndedzo dzinopfuura 1 dzine zvikamu zviviri chete: 1 uye iyo pachayo.

lessonPlan.title: Zvikamu & Madimikira
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvezvikamu, zvikamu zvakafanana, uye kuti madimikira anobatana sei nezvikamu.

practiceQuestions.question: Ko 2/4 ne 1/2 zvakafanana here? (hongu kana kwete)

contentParagraphs: Chikamu chinomiririra chikamu chechimwe chinhu. Nhamba iri pamusoro inonzi numerator, iri pasi denominator.
Zvikamu zvakafanana ndizvo zvinomiririra kukosha kumwe chete, sekuti 1/2 ne 2/4.
Madimikira inzira yekuratidza zvikamu zvechimwe chinhu, uchishandisa decimal point. Semuenzaniso, 0.5 yakafanana ne 1/2.

subcourses.name: Masvomhu Epamusoro
subcourses.description: Kudzidza kwepamusoro kwekuverenga, algebra, uye geometry.

lessonPlan.title: Algebra
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezve algebra, kusanganisira maitiro ealgebra, kugadzirisa zvikanganiso, uye maitiro eqadratic.
contentParagraphs: Algebra ibazi remasvomhu rinobata nemaitiro ekushandura, kugadzirisa, uye kuongorora zvirevo nemaitiro anosanganisira nhamba, tsananguro, uye masvomhu.
Maitiro eAlgebra anosanganisira kuwedzera, kubvisa, kukwidziridza, uye kudzikisa. Aya ndiwo maitiro akakosha ekugadzirisa zvikanganiso.
Kugadzirisa Zvikanganiso ibasa rekutsvaga uye kugadzirisa zvikanganiso mumaitiro kana zvirevo. Izvi zvinogona kusanganisira kugadzirisa x kana imwe variable.

Maitiro eQuadratic ianotungamira ekugadzirisa maitiro eqadratic, ayo ane chimiro che ax^2 + bx + c = 0. Nzira dzakajairika dzekugadzirisa dzinosanganisira factoring, kuwedzera kwekushandisa, uye kushandisa fomula yequadratic.

lessonPlan.title: Geometry
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezve geometry, kusanganisira maitiro egeometry, kuyera uye kuenzanisa, uye maitiro ePythagorean.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi hypotenuse mu triangle ine mativi 3, 4, uye 5?
Kuyera kwechikamu chepamusoro chechikero chechikero chakaenzana ne 10cm, uye chichiri 2cm, chichava nehurefu hwakadii?
Kana angle imwe ye triangle iri 90 degrees uye imwe iri 45 degrees, angle yechitatu ichave yakadii?

contentParagraphs: Geometry ibazi remasvomhu rinobata nezviyero, maumbirwo, uye maitiro ezvinhu zviri muupenyu chaihwo. Inosanganisira kuongorora, kuyera, uye kugadzira zvinhu zvine maumbirwo akasiyana-siyana.
Maitiro eGeometry anosanganisira kutarisa, kuyera, kuenzanisa, uye kugadzira. Aya ndiwo maitiro akakosha ekuongorora uye kugadzira zvinhu zvine maumbirwo.
Kuyera uye Kuenzanisa ibasa rekuyera uye kuenzanisa saizi, chimiro, uye nzvimbo yezvinhu. Izvi zvinogona kusanganisira kuyera urefu, upamhi, uye kureba.

Maitiro ePythagorean ianotungamira ekushandisa mutemo waPythagoras, uyo unoti hypotenuse yechikero chechikero chakaenzana ne square root yechiyero chechikero chechikero. Izvi zvinogona kubatsira pakuyera uye kuenzanisa maumbirwo akasiyana-siyana.

lessonPlan.title: Trigonometry
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezve trigonometry, kusanganisira maitiro etrigonometry, sine, cosine, uye tangent, uye trigonometric ratios.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi sine theta kana theta iri 30 degrees?
Chii chinonzi cosine theta kana theta iri 60 degrees?
Chii chinonzi tangent theta kana theta iri 45 degrees?

contentParagraphs: Trigonometry ibazi remasvomhu rinobata nezvikamu uye maitiro emazinga ezvikamu. Inosanganisira kuongorora, kuyera, uye kugadzira maumbirwo akasiyana-siyana.
Maitiro eTrigonometry anosanganisira kutarisa, kuyera, kuenzanisa, uye kugadzira. Aya ndiwo maitiro akakosha ekuongorora uye kugadzira maumbirwo akasiyana-siyana.
Sine, Cosine, uye Tangent ndiwo maitiro matatu akakosha eTrigonometry. Aya maitiro anobatsira pakuyera uye kuenzanisa maumbirwo akasiyana-siyana.
Trigonometric Ratios ibasa rekuyera uye kuenzanisa maumbirwo akasiyana-siyana. Izvi zvinogona kubatsira pakuyera uye kuenzanisa maumbirwo akasiyana-siyana.

courses.name: Sainzi
courses.description: Biology, Chemistry, uye Physics Dzidziso Dzakakosha
courses.aiTip: Ngatitsvagei zvinoshamisa zve sainzi pamwe chete!

subcourses.name: Nhanganyaya kuSainzi
subcourses.description: Tsvaga zvinyorwa zvekufunga kwesainzi uye nzira yesainzi.

lessonPlan.title: Chii chinonzi Sainzi?
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza kuti sainzi chii uye kuti inotibatsira sei kunzwisisa nyika yakatikomberedza.

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi sainzi inodzidza zvinhu uye simba?

contentParagraphs: Sainzi inzira yakarongeka yekudzidza nezvenyika yechisikigo kuburikidza nekuona uye kuedza. Inotibatsira kunzwisisa kuti zvinhu zvinoshanda sei uye kuti nei zvichiitika nenzira iyoyo.
Pane mhando dzakasiyana dze sainzi, kusanganisira biology (kudzidza zvirimwa nezvipenyu), chemistry (kudzidza zvinhu uye kushanduka kwazvo), uye physics (kudzidza simba nemasimba).
Kufunga kwe sainzi kunosanganisira kubvunza mibvunzo, kuona, kugadzira fungidziro, uye kuedza pfungwa kuburikidza nemiedzo.

lessonPlan.title: Nzira yeSainzi
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nzira yesainzi, hwaro hwekutsvaga kwe sainzi yose.

practiceQuestions.question: Vesainzi vanoitasei mushure mekuedza fungidziro yavo?

contentParagraphs: Nzira yesainzi inzira yakarongeka yekugadzirisa matambudziko uye kupindura mibvunzo. Ine matanho akakosha anoteverwa nevasainzi kuti basa ravo rive rechokwadi uye rinodzokororwa.
Nhanho yekutanga ndeyekubvunza mubvunzo pamusoro pechimwe chaunoona. Wobva watsvaga zviripo, wogadzira fungidziro, inova pfungwa yakadzidziswa pamusoro pezvichaitika.
Tevedzera nekugadzira uye kuita miedzo yekuyedza fungidziro. Pakupedzisira, ongorora zvabuda, dhonza mhedziso, uye goverana zvawawana nevamwe.

lessonPlan.title: Kuona & Kuedza
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza kuita kuona kwakanyatsonaka uye kugadzira miedzo inoshanda.
contentParagraphs: Kuona ndiko hwaro hwekutsvaga kwesainzi. Pane mhando mbiri: qualitative (tsananguro nemazwi) uye quantitative (kuverenga nemanhamba).
Miedzo inoitwa kuti ipindure mibvunzo yakatarwa. Inosanganisira kuchinja chinhu chimwe chete uchisiya zvimwe zvakangofanana kuti uone mutsauko wacho.
Kuunganidza dhata kwakakosha mumiedzo. Vasainzi vanofanira kunyora zvavanoona nemazvo, vachishandisa matafura, magirafu, kana machati kuronga zvawanikwa.

subcourses.name: Biology Fundamentals
subcourses.description: Nzwisisa misimboti ye biology, kusanganisira masero, mapuroteni, uye DNA.

lessonPlan.title: Masero
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvemaitiro nemaitiro emasero, iyo inova hwaro hweupenyu.

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi cell organelle inotungamira basa remasero?

contentParagraphs: Masero ndiwo madiki anoumba zvinhu zvipenyu. Ivo navo vanotora uye vanoshandura simba, vachigadzira mapuroteni, uye vachichengetedza ruzivo rwepasi rose.
Pane mhando dzakasiyana dzemasero, kusanganisira masero epanyama, masero ezvirimwa, uye masero ekubatanidza. Imwe neimwe ine basa rayo uye inobatsira kune yakazara biology yechirimwa kana mhuka.
Masero ane zvikamu zvakakosha, senge nucleus (inotungamira masero), cytoplasm (nzvimbo yemaitiro), uye cell membrane (inodzivirira uye inotonga kupinda nekubuda kwezvinhu).

lessonPlan.title: Mapuroteni
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvemaitiro nemaitiro emapuroteni, ayo ane basa rakakosha muupenyu.
contentParagraphs: Mapuroteni ndiwo masimba anovaka muviri anodiwa pakukura, kugadzirisa, uye kuchengetedza hupenyu. Ivo vanobatsira mukugadzira masero, mapfupa, mhasuru, uye mamwe marudzi emapuroteni.
Mapuroteni anoumbwa nezvikamu zvidiki zvinonzi amino acids. Aya maamino acids anobatanidzwa pamwechete kuita chain, iyo inozoshandurwa kuita protein fold.
Maitiro ekugadzira mapuroteni anosanganisira kutora ruzivo kubva kuDNA, kugadzira messenger RNA (mRNA), uye kushandisa ribosomes kugadzira mapuroteni kubva kumapuroteni.

lessonPlan.title: DNA
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezve DNA, iyo inotakura ruzivo rwepasi rose uye ine basa mukudzora maitiro emasero.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi gene?
practiceQuestions.answer: chikamu cheDNA chinotungamira chimiro kana basa remuviri

contentParagraphs: DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid) ndiyo inotakura ruzivo rwepasi rose mumasero. Iyo ine chimiro chedouble helix, ine mapundu maviri akabatana nemabond akasimba.
DNA ine zvikamu zviviri: purines (adenine uye guanine) uye pyrimidines (cytosine uye thymine). Aya mapundu anobatana pamwechete kuita DNA strand.
Basa reDNA mukati me cell nderekuchengetedza uye kutakura ruzivo rwepasi rose. Iine mirairo inodiwa pakugadzira mapuroteni uye kutungamira maitiro emasero.

subcourses.name: Chemistry Basics
subcourses.description: Nzwisisa misimboti ye chemistry, kusanganisira maatomu, mapuroteni, uye maitiro ekushandura.

lessonPlan.title: Maatomu
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvemaitiro nemaitiro emaatomu, ayo ari hwaro hwezvinhu zvose.
contentParagraphs: Maatomu ndiwo madiki anoumba zvinhu zvose. Ivo vane nucleus ine protons uye neutrons, uye electrons dzakatenderedza nucleus.
Maitiro emaatomu anosanganisira kuwedzera, kubvisa, uye kugadzirisa. Aya ndiwo maitiro akakosha ekugadzira uye kushandura zvinhu.
Maatomu ane atomic number, inoratidza huwandu hweprotons mu nucleus, uye atomic mass, inoratidza huwandu hwese hwepamusoro muatomu.

lessonPlan.title: Mapuroteni
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvemaitiro nemaitiro emapuroteni, ayo ane basa rakakosha muupenyu.
contentParagraphs: Mapuroteni ndiwo masimba anovaka muviri anodiwa pakukura, kugadzirisa, uye kuchengetedza hupenyu. Ivo vanobatsira mukugadzira masero, mapfupa, mhasuru, uye mamwe marudzi emapuroteni.
Mapuroteni anoumbwa nezvikamu zvidiki zvinonzi amino acids. Aya maamino acids anobatanidzwa pamwechete kuita chain, iyo inozoshandurwa kuita protein fold.
Maitiro ekugadzira mapuroteni anosanganisira kutora ruzivo kubva kuDNA, kugadzira messenger RNA (mRNA), uye kushandisa ribosomes kugadzira mapuroteni kubva kumapuroteni.

lessonPlan.title: Maitiro Ekushandura
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvemaitiro ekushandura zvinhu uye kuti sei kuchinja kwezvinhu kuchikosha.

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi chemical reaction inoitika pakupisa mafuta?

contentParagraphs: Maitiro ekushandura zvinhu anoratidza kuti zvinhu zvinogona kuchinjwa sei kubva kune chimiro kusvika kune chimwe pasina kuchinja huwandu hwazvo.
Pane mhando dzakasiyana dze chemical reactions, kusanganisira synthesis (kuunganidza), decomposition (kupatsanura), uye replacement (kutsiva).
Kuchengetedza uye Kushandura ibasa rekuchengetedza uye kushandura zvinhu mumaitiro. Izvi zvinogona kusanganisira kugadzirisa, kupisa, kana kuwedzera zvinhu.

subcourses.name: Physics Principles
subcourses.description: Nzwisisa misimboti ye physics, kusanganisira simba, mitemo yeNewton, uye maitiro ekufamba.

lessonPlan.title: Simba
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvesimba, rudzi rwesimba, uye kuti simba rinoshanda sei.
contentParagraphs: Simba ibasa rinokonzera kuti chinhu chichinje kana kufamba. Iine hukama hwakasimba nemaitiro ekufamba kwezvinhu.
Mhando dze simba dzinosanganisira kinetic (simba rekufamba), potential (simba rinogona), thermal, chemical, uye nuclear energy.
Simba rinowanzoyerwa muNewtons (N), uye basa rinoyerwa mumamita (m) kana masendimita (cm).

lessonPlan.title: Mitemo yeNewton
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvemitemo yaNewton, iyo inotungamira maitiro ezvinhu muupenyu hwezuva nezuva.

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi mutemo wekutanga waNewton?
practiceQuestions.answer: chinhu chicharamba chichifamba kana chisina kusundidzirwa

contentParagraphs: Mitemo yeNewton inotsanangura maitiro ezvinhu kana simba rinoshanda pazvinenge zvichikonzera kuchinja.
Mutemo wekutanga unoti chinhu chicharamba chichifamba kana chisina kusundidzirwa. Izvi zvinoreva kuti zvinhu hazvichinji kufamba kana kumira pasina chikonzero.
Inertia ndiyo chikonzero nei zvinhu zvichiramba zviri munzira imwechete kana zvichifamba. Izvi zvinoratidza kuti zvinhu zvinoda simba kuti zvichinje kufamba kwazvo.
Simba reGravity rinokwevera zvinhu pasi, richikonzera kuti zvinhu zvese zvipinze pasi pevhu kana pane chimwe chinhu.

lessonPlan.title: Maitiro Ekufamba
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvemaitiro ekufamba kwezvinhu uye kuti simba rinokanganisa sei kufamba.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi momentum?
practiceQuestions.answer: mufambiro wezvinhu, unowanikwa nekubatanidza mass uye velocity

contentParagraphs: Kufamba ibasa rekuchinja nzvimbo. Izvi zvinogona kusanganisira kufamba kwevanhu, zvinhu, kana masimba.
Speed inoyerwa mumamita paawa (m/s) kana masendimita paawa (cm/s). Inoratidza kuwanda kwekufamba panguva.
Acceleration inoratidza kuchinja kwe speed panguva. Inoyerwa mumamita paawa squared (m/s^2).
Momentum ibasa rinoratidza mufambiro wezvinhu. Inowanikwa nekubatanidza mass uye velocity. Izvi zvinoratidza kuti zvinhu zvakakura kana kufamba nekukurumidza zvine momentum yakawanda.

courses.aiTip: Ndichakubatsira kuva munyori uye muverengi ane chivimbo!

subcourses.name: Kunzwisisa Kuverenga
subcourses.description: Dzidza kuverenga zvinyorwa zvakasiyana uye kupindura mibvunzo yekunzwisisa kuverenga.

lessonPlan.title: Maitiro ekuverenga ane hungwaru
lessonPlan.description: Gadzira nzira dzekuverenga uchifunga uye kufunga zvakadzama paunoverenga zvinyorwa.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chaunofanira kuita usati waverenga chinyorwa kuti unzwisise zviri nani?
Ndeipi mibvunzo inobatsira kuti uve mukati mechinyorwa paunoverenga?
Ndeipi nzira yekuverenga inosanganisira kufembera chichaitika?

contentParagraphs: Kuverenga uchifunga zvinoreva kupinda muchinyorwa kwete kungoverenga mazwi. Izvi zvinosanganisira kubvunza mibvunzo, kuita kubatana, uye kufunga nezvauchiverenga.
Kubvunza zvinyorwa kunobatsira kugara wakatarisa uye kunzwisisa zvakadzama. Bvunza mibvunzo yekuti 'nei' pamusoro pezviito zvevatambi, zvisarudzo zvemunyori, uye kufambira mberi kwezviitiko.
Kufembera paunoverenga kunobatsira kugara wakatarisa uye kuyedza kunzwisisa. Gara uchizvibvunza kuti chii chaunofunga kuti chichaitika uye nei.

lessonPlan.title: Kupfupikisa uye Kuongorora
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza maitiro ekupfupikisa zvinyorwa uye kunyora tsananguro dzakajeka.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi kupfupikisa?
practiceQuestions.answer: kuderedza chinyorwa kuita pfupi pasina kurasikirwa nechinangwa chayo

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi nzira yakanaka yekunyora tsananguro?
practiceQuestions.answer: shandisa mazwi akajeka uye pfupi, uye udzivise kudhinda zvakawandisa

practiceQuestions.question: Sei kuongorora kwechinyorwa kwakakosha?
practiceQuestions.answer: kuti uone kana chinyorwa chichikodzera uye chichitevedzera mitemo yeunyanzvi

contentParagraphs: Kupfupikisa kunosanganisira kutora pfungwa huru dzechinyorwa uye kuzviisa mumazwi mashoma. Izvi zvinobatsira kuwedzera kunzwisisa uye kurangarira.
Kunyora tsananguro kunosanganisira kugadzira chirevo chidiki chinotsanangura chinyorwa. Izvi zvinoda kunzwisisa kwakadzama kwechinyorwa.
Kuongorora kwechinyorwa kunosanganisira kutarisa uye kuongorora chinyorwa kuti uone kana chichikodzera uye chichitevedzera mitemo yeunyanzvi.

lessonPlan.title: Kunyora neKugadzirisa
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza maitiro ekunyora zvinyorwa zvine musoro uye kugadzirisa zvinyorwa zvako.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi outline mukunyora?
practiceQuestions.answer: chirongwa kana chirevo chezvinhu zvichaiswa muchinyorwa

practiceQuestions.question: Sei kugadzirisa kuchikosha mukunyora?
practiceQuestions.answer: kuti uvandudze uye uwedzere kunaka kwechinyorwa

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi nzira yakanaka yekunyora chinyorwa?
practiceQuestions.answer: tanga nepfungwa huru, wobva wawedzera tsananguro uye mienzaniso

contentParagraphs: Kunyora kunosanganisira kugadzira uye kuisa pamwechete mazwi, mitsara, nemagwaro kuti ugadzire chinyorwa.
Kugadzirisa kunosanganisira kutarisa uye kugadzirisa chinyorwa kuti uone kana chichikodzera uye chichitevedzera mitemo yeunyanzvi.
Nzira yakanaka yekunyora chinyorwa inosanganisira kutanga nepfungwa huru, wobva wawedzera tsananguro, mienzaniso, uye humbowo hwekutsigira pfungwa dzako.

lessonPlan.description: Dzidza maitiro ekugadzirisa zvinyorwa uye kuongorora kuti zvigadziriswe.

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi proofreading?
practiceQuestions.answer: kuverenga uye kugadzirisa chinyorwa kuti uone zvikanganiso

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi nzira yakanaka yekugadzirisa chinyorwa?
practiceQuestions.answer: verenga zvakare, tarisa grammar uye spelling, uye uone kuti zvese zviri pachena

practiceQuestions.question: Sei kuongorora kuchikosha mukugadzirisa?
practiceQuestions.answer: kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti chinyorwa chako hachina zvikanganiso uye chiri nyore kunzwisisa

contentParagraphs: Kugadzirisa kunosanganisira kutarisa uye kugadzirisa chinyorwa kuti uone kana chichikodzera uye chichitevedzera mitemo yeunyanzvi.
Nzira yakanaka yekugadzirisa chinyorwa inosanganisira kuverenga zvakare, kutarisa grammar uye spelling, uye kuona kuti zvese zviri pachena uye zviri nyore kunzwisisa.
Kuongorora kwechinyorwa kunosanganisira kutarisa uye kuongorora chinyorwa kuti uone kana chichikodzera uye chichitevedzera mitemo yeunyanzvi.

lessonPlan.title: Kuongorora
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza maitiro ekudzokorora uye kugadzirisa zvinyorwa zvako.

practiceQuestions.question: Sei kuongorora kwechinyorwa kwakakosha?
practiceQuestions.answer: kuti uone kana chinyorwa chichikodzera uye chichitevedzera mitemo yeunyanzvi

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi nzira yakanaka yekudzokorora chinyorwa?
practiceQuestions.answer: tora nguva, verenga nemazvo, uye uone kuti zvese zviri pachena

contentParagraphs: Kuongorora kunosanganisira kutarisa uye kuongorora chinyorwa kuti uone kana chichikodzera uye chichitevedzera mitemo yeunyanzvi.
Nzira yakanaka yekudzokorora chinyorwa inosanganisira kutora nguva, kuverenga nemazvo, uye kuona kuti zvese zviri pachena uye zviri nyore kunzwisisa.
Feedback ibasa rinokosha mukuvandudza kunyora kwako. Inokubatsira kuona nzvimbo dzekuvandudza uye kusimudzira unyanzvi hwako hwekunyora.

lessonPlan.title: Zvinhu uye Mhando dzeDhata
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezve mhando dze dhata muC++, kuzivisa zvinhu, uye kushanda nezvisingachinji.

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi mhando yedhata yaungashandisa kuchengetedza nhamba yakazara muC++?
Unonyora sei chinhu chinonzi 'age' chine kukosha 25?
Ndeipi keyword inoshandiswa kuzivisa chinhu chisina kuchinja muC++?

contentParagraphs: C++ mutauro une mhando dzakasimba, zvinoreva kuti chinhu chimwe nechimwe chinofanira kuva nemhando yacho. Mhando dzakajairika dzinosanganisira int (nhamba yakazara), double (nhamba dzine madimikira), char (chiratidzo chimwe), uye string (mazwi).
Kuzivisa chinhu muC++ kunotevera: data_type zita = kukosha;. Semuenzaniso, 'int age = 25;' inozivisa chinhu chinonzi age chine kukosha 25.
Zvisingachinji zvinhu zvisingachinji mushure mekuziviswa. Shandisa 'const' kuzivisa, semuenzaniso 'const int MAX_SIZE = 100;'.

lessonPlan.title: Maitiro Ekutonga
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza maitiro ekutonga muC++, kusanganisira maitiro econditional, maitiro eloop, uye maitiro eswitch.

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi syntax ye for loop muC++?
Chii chinonzi switch statement?
practiceQuestions.answer: control statement inochinja pakati pemaitiro akasiyana

contentParagraphs: Maitiro ekutonga anobvumira kutora kwechisarudzo mukodhi. Izvi zvinoreva kuti unogona kugadzirisa kuti kodhi iite chimwe chinhu kana chimwe zvichienderana nemaitiro.
Maitiro econditional anosanganisira if, else if, uye else statements. Aya maitiro anobvumira kutora kwechisarudzo zvichienderana nemaitiro.
Maitiro eloop anoshandiswa kudzokorora chikamu chekodi kakawanda. Semuenzaniso, for loop inodzokorora kodhi block kakawanda, nepo while loop ichidzokorora kusvika condition yaitwa ichokwadi.
Maitiro eswitch anoshandiswa kuchinja pakati pemaitiro akasiyana zvichienderana nekukosha kwechinhu. Izvi zvinobatsira pakugadzirisa kodhi uye kuita kuti ive nyore kuverenga.

lessonPlan.title: Mabasa uye Makirasi
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nezvemabasa nemakirasi muC++, kusanganisira kugadzira mabasa, kushandisa makirasi, uye kugadzira makirasi.
contentParagraphs: Mabasa nemakirasi ibasa rekugadzirisa kodhi uye kuita kuti ive nyore kushandisa. Mabasa anobvumira kudzokorora kodhi, nepo makirasi achigadzira mapoka ezvinhu ane maitiro akafanana.
Kugadzira basa muC++ kunosanganisira kushandisa keyword inonzi 'void' kana 'return_type'. Semuenzaniso, 'void myFunction() { }' inogadzira basa rinonzi myFunction.
Makirasi anogadzirwa nekushandisa keyword inonzi 'class'. Mukirasi, unogona kugadzira mabasa, zvinhu, uye makirasi akasiyana-siyana.
Kushandisa makirasi kunosanganisira kugadzira object kubva mukirasi. Semuenzaniso, 'Car myCar;' inogadzira object inonzi myCar kubva mukirasi yeCar.

lessonPlan.title: Object-Oriented Programming
lessonPlan.description: Dzidza nheyo dzeObject-Oriented Programming muC++, kusanganisira kuvanzika, kudzokorora, uye inheritance.

practiceQuestions.question: Ndeipi pfungwa ye encapsulation muOOP?
practiceQuestions.answer: kuvanzika kwemaitiro uye zvinhu mukati meclass

practiceQuestions.question: Chii chinonzi inheritance muOOP?
practiceQuestions.answer: kugamuchira maitiro nemaitiro kubva kune imwe class

contentParagraphs: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) ibudiriro yehurongwa inotarisa pakushandisa zvinhu uye maitiro. OOP inobvumira kugadzirisa kodhi, kudzokorora, uye kuvandudza.
Pfungwa huru dzeOOP dzinosanganisira encapsulation (kuvanzika), inheritance (kudzokorora), uye polymorphism (kushanduka-shanduka).
Encapsulation inobvumira kuvanzika kwemaitiro uye zvinhu mukati meclass. Izvi zvinoreva kuti zvinhu hazvigamuchirwi kana kuchinjwa zvakananga kubva kunze kweclass.
Inheritance inobvumira kugamuchira maitiro nemaitiro kubva kune imwe class. Izvi zvinobatsira pakudzokorora kodhi uye kugadzira mapoka ezvinhu ane maitiro akafanana.
